General.Name: Shanghai Awinic Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Awinic Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the development and sale of integrated circuit chips in China and internationally. It offers digital-analog mixed-signal, analog, and radio frequency. The company's products portfolio includes audio power amplifier chips; LED driver chips that include backlight driver, breathing lamp driver, and flash driver; and power management chips, including overvoltage protection circuits, low-dropout linear regulators, boost chips, buck chips, fast charging chips, load switches, and other products. The company's RF front-end chips include 2T, 4T, 6T, 8T switches, GPS, LTE, and FM low-noise amplifiers, GSM power amplifiers, and other devices, antenna tuners, antenna switches, 5G RF switches, etc. In addition, it provides self-developed motor driver chips, comprising haptic drivers, capacitive touch controllers, stepper motor drivers, DC motor drivers, voice coil motor drivers, and other chip products. Its products are used in consumer electronics, Internet of Things, industry and automotive fields, and in various electronic products. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Aiwei Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shanghai Awinic Technology Co.,Ltd. in December 2014. Shanghai Awinic Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
